#include<stdio.h>

inline int read(){

	int n = 0 ;
	char c = getchar() ;

	while( c<48 || c>57 ) c = getchar() ;

	while( c>=48 && c<=57 ){
	
		n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + (c-48) ;
		c = getchar() ;
	}
	return n ;
}

int main(){

	int T = read() ;
	int N , mid3 , tmp , i;

	int frst , last , ans1 , ans2 , ans3 ;
	bool found ;
	while(T--){
	
		N = read() ;
		mid3 = 0 ;
		for(i=1 ; i<=3 ; i++){
		
			tmp = read() ;
			mid3 = (mid3<<3) + (mid3<<1) + tmp ;
		}

		found = false ;
		tmp = mid3 ;
		for(frst = 9 ; frst >=1 ; frst--){
		
			if(found)
				break ;

			for(last = 9 ; last >= 0 ; last--){
			

				if(found)
					break ;

				mid3 = tmp ;
				mid3 = frst*10000 + (mid3<<3) + (mid3<<1) + last ;

				if( mid3 % N == 0 ){
				
					ans1 = frst ;
					ans2 = last ;
					ans3 = (mid3/N) ;
					found = true ;
				}

			}

			
		}

		if(found)
			printf("%d %d %d\n", ans1 , ans2 , ans3) ;
		else
			printf("0\n") ;
	}

	return 0 ;
}
